overview: In the future, humans are divided into Sex Negatives and Sex Positives. The negatives get sick if they have sex so they go to Café Flesh to see positives who are forced to perform on stage for the negatives. Lana is a positive who everyone thinks is a negative and she must decide whether to come clean or not.
tagline: THE TIME... Five Years After The Nuclear War. THE SURVIVORS... Post-Nuke Thrill Seekers Lookin' For A Kick.
title: Café Flesh
